name: Onboarding Flow
description:
As a Ballpark user, I want to know the information needed to enter the stadium by facial recognition so that I successfully enrolled in the GoAhead-Entry program.

description: As a PHI Ballpark user, I want successfully enroll in the GoAhead-Entry program via a valid image submission so that I can participate in the program

name: Analytics

name: Deeplink to Registration
description:
We use ballpark://go-ahead for the context card deeplink. This deeplink needs to be supported from as an external deeplink as well from a push notification or QR code scan


Android: [BPA-7173](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7173)
iOS: ??? (But verified that the behavior is functional and test case has been created for testing purpose)

name: Go-Ahead Enrollment Status
description:
In order for Go-Ahead Entry to continue to evolve as a program, we need to help gate staff quickly and efficiently determine if a fan is enrolled in Go-Ahead Entry. This spike is to investigate a potential UI option for displaying this within the new Home tab. This design is by no means final but rather exploratory. 

Android:https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7917
iOS:https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11193
